import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import { Container, Row, Col } from 'reactstrap' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import Helmet from '../components/Helmet/Helmet' import CommonSection from '../components/Ui/CommonSection' import products from '../assets/data/products' import '../styles/products-details.css' import { motion } from 'framer-motion' const ProductDetails = () => { const [tab, setTab] = useState('desc') const [rating, setRating] = useState(null) const {id} = useParams() const product = products.find(item => item.id === id) const { imgUrl, productName, price, avgRating, reviews, description, shortDesc } = product return (

{productName}

({avgRating} ratings)

${price}

{shortDesc}

ADD TO CART
setTab("desc")} > Description
setTab("rev")} > Review ({reviews.length})
{tab === "desc" ? (

{description}

) : (
    { reviews?.map((item, index) => (
  • Jhon Doe
    {item.rating} (average rating)

    {item.text}

    • )) }

Say Somthing.....

1 setRating(1)} className="ri-star-s-fill"> 2 setRating(1)} className="ri-star-s-fill"> 3 setRating(1)} className="ri-star-s-fill"> 4 setRating(1)} className="ri-star-s-fill"> 5 setRating(1)} className="ri-star-s-fill">
